meta.name: SEC Championship Game
meta.description: The SEC Championship Game (officially The SEC Championship on CBS presented by Dr Pepper for broadcast and sponsorship purposes) is an annual game that has determined the Southeastern Conference's football season champion since 1992. The championship game pits the SEC Western Division regular season champion against the Eastern Division regular season champion and is held a week after the SEC regular season has been completed (typically on the first Saturday of December). Ten of the fourteen current SEC members have played in the SEC Championship Game. Kentucky and Vanderbilt have yet to reach the game from the East, while Ole Miss and Texas A&M have yet to reach the game from the West.

videos.title: 2025 SEC Championship Game: #9 Alabama Crimson Tide (10-2) vs. #3 Georgia Bulldogs (11-1)
videos.overview: The Crimson Tide (10-2) and Bulldogs (11-1) meet in the SEC championship game for the third time in five years from the Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta, Georgia. Alabama is 4-0 against Georgia in SEC title contests. The Bulldogs yielded a total of 22 points in the last three outings.
